products - DTC range

The DCW high-capacity low profile load cell

DTC tension load cells

The DCW stainless steel, high accuracy, bending ring, low profile, compression load
cell is designed for use in a range of industrial applications including
weighbridges, tanks, vessels, silos, high-capacity platforms etc.

rugged | High Accuracy | Compact
Key Features

DTC

  • Capacities (t): 
    5, 10, 20 & 30t
  • Low Profile Design 
  • 2 mv per Volt Rationalised
  • IP68 Rating
Typical applications

DTC

  • Weighbridges
  • Tank Weighing  
  • Silo Weighing
  • Platform Weighing 
  • Vessel Weighing
